document_title: Stye: Causes, signs, diagnosis and prevention
subsection_content:
Styes cause pain, discomfort, affect vision, and make communication difficult. Below are methods to prevent styes [5]:
Keep eyelids and eyelashes clean, remove eye makeup before sleeping.; Wash your hands before touching the area around your eyes.; Do not share eye makeup.; Change eye makeup every 3 months.; Keep contact lenses clean, do not wear contact lenses too much.; If you have blepharitis, you need to be examined and treated according to your doctor's instructions.; Do not share towels or household items with someone who has a stye.
subsection_title: leo mat.json. How to prevent eye styes?
